articles.author: Jakob Weizman
articles.title: Kosovo heads to polls hoping to break political deadlock - politico.eu
articles.description: Europe’s youngest country is headed for yet another election, casting its European path further in doubt.
articles.content:
But if the country fails to form a government again, Kosovo risks losing access to the bloc’s 6 billion Growth Plan for the Western Balkans, as it needs to deliver reforms to unlock the funding.
“Ko… [+1188 chars]
